The '''''Tolkien 2005 Souvenir Book''''' was produced in [[2010]] by [[The Tolkien Society]] and sent out to all attendees of the [[Tolkien 2005]] conference held at [[wikipedia:Aston University|Aston University]], [[Birmingham]]. The book includes reports and photos from the event along with copies of the 19 news bulletins that were sent out.

==Contents==
* '''The Chairman's Bit''': "...A Celebration to Remember..."
** By: [[Chris Crawshaw]]
** Including messages from [[John Howe]] and [[Brian Sibley]]
* '''Publicising Tolkien 2005''': The Road Goes Ever On
** By: Ian Collier
* '''Reception at the Council House'''
* "News" editions 1-5
* '''The Opening Ceremony'''
* '''Tolkien Coach Tour August 2005'''
** By: [[Robert S. Blackham|Bob Blackham]]
* "News" editions 6-10
* '''Reviews'''
** Tolkien 2005 Through Italian Eyes
*** By: [[Maria Raffaella Benvenuto|Raffaella 'Nienna' Benvenuto]]
** Tolkien 2005 - An Irish Presenter's View
*** By: Murray Smith
** Aston 2005 or A Long Weekend in Mor-door
*** By: Lyn Wilshire
* '''[[Tolkien 2005#Guests|Guests]]'''
* '''Drama Workshop'''
** By: [[Viv Wilkes]]
* The Reduced Silmarillion Company
* "News" editions 11-15
* '''Welcome to the Costume Extravaganza'''
* "News" editions 16-19
* Dramatisation of parts of the [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|BBC Radio 4 adaptation]] of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''
** Performed by: The [[Cambridge Tolkien Society]]
* "News" editions 20 & 21
* '''The Closing Ceremony'''
